<style>
    /*Voucher Banner style*/
    .ug_Voucher_banner {
        position: relative;
    }
    
    .ug_Voucher_banner img {
        width: 100%;
    }
    
    .ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_mol {
        display: none;
    }
    
    .ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_box {
        position: absolute;
        top: 20%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
      text-align: center;
    }
    
    .ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_box h1 {
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 2.083vw;
        color: #000;
    }
    
    .ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_box p {
        font-size: 1.042vw;
        color: #666666;
        margin: 0.521vw 0 0 0;
    }
    /*Universal Voucher Style*/
    .universal_voucher{
        position: relative;
        margin-top: -10.2vw;
        padding-bottom: 2vw;
    }
    .universal_voucher h2{
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 1.875vw;
        text-align: center;
        margin-bottom: 2.083vw;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box{
        display: flex;
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 20.833vw;
        border-radius: 0.208vw;
        transition: all 0.3s;
        overflow: hidden;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%);
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list:hover{
        box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgb(0 0 0 / 48%);
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .price{
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        padding: 2.083vw 1.875vw;
        background: linear-gradient(180deg, #FB2A22 0%, #FFBB00 188.89%);
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .price p{
        font-family: 'Lato'!important;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 3.542vw;
        margin: 0;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        line-height: 3.542vw;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .price p span{
        font-size: 1.875vw;
        position: relative;
        top: -1.302vw;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list ul{
        margin: 0;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list ul li{
        font-size: 0.729vw;
        line-height: 1.146vw;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        list-style-type: disc;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list ul li::marker{
        font-size: 12px;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code{
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        padding: 0.625vw 1.875vw;
        background: linear-gradient(0deg, #000000, #000000), linear-gradient(90deg, #FB2A22 10.04%, #FFE3BF 66.16%, #FFFFFF 105.5%);
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code p{
        margin: 0;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        color: #FFFFFF;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code button{
        padding: 0.46875vw 0;
        width: 8.333vw;
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        color: #000000;
        transition: all 0.3s;
        background: #FFFFFF;
        border-radius: 3.125vw;
    }
    .universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code button:hover{
        background: #00CC88;
        color: #FFFFFF;
    }
    /*Product Voucher Style*/
    .product_voucher{

    }
    .product_voucher .product_voucher_box{

    .product_voucher .product_code_list .code button{

    /*How to Use Style*/
    .how_to_use{
        padding: 6.25vw 0;

    }
    .how_to_use h2{

    }
    .how_to_use .how_to_use_box{

    .how_to_use .how_to_use_box .box_List{

    }
    .how_to_use .how_to_use_box>div:last-child span:after {
